description:
A 4th grader in Saint Terejia Gakuen. However, she is also a princess of Doll Land, but she doesn`t know it.
Rika was given a bracelet, called "Calling Ring", that she wears all the time.
When she gets in a dangerous situation, the bracelet rings, and sends a signal to her grandmother. Then Doll Licca comes to the rescue.
name: Kayama Rika
